Pre-Game Insights: Team India aims to solve the jigsaw puzzle in the upcoming T20I series against Australia.
India will be keen to lock their best combination in these home games, with skipper Rohit Sharma giving his boys the license to extend their 'limits'.
One eye will be on how KL Rahul approaches his innings against a quality bowling lineup led by Pat Cummins and Josh Hazlewood.
The wicketkeeper's slot will once again attract suggestions from various quarters, with left-hander Rishabh Pant having a slight edge over the ageless Dinesh Karthik.
Axar Patel could be tested as a like-for-like replacement for Ravindra Jadeja in the sixth bowling option.
Australia have rested their main players, including David Warner, for the brief tour, but still boast enough IPL experience among their squad.
